user_question: Under the pro mode to shoot, what is the function of the icon on right hand side of the icon that set white balance?

knowledge_chain.query: function of the icon next to white balance setting in pro mode shooting
knowledge_chain.raw_result:
The icon next to the white balance (WB) setting in Pro Mode shooting allows users to select a specific white balance mode. In the context of the Huawei Nova Y70's camera interface, touching this icon enables the user to choose the appropriate white balance based on the shooting conditions, such as daylight or overcast settings. This feature is crucial for achieving accurate color representation in photographs, especially in varying lighting environments. 

This functionality supports the instructional guidance found within the Pro Mode details, which emphasizes the importance of adjusting various camera settings, including white balance, to optimize the capturing of images.
